metadata.title: CVE-2023-39368 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Protection mechanism failure of bus lock regulator for some Intel(R)Processors may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable denialof service via network access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39368` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20240514.0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20240514.0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
